item.title: Unwanted old furniture left on the public footpath, 21st August
item.description:
37 Cambridge Road. A resident of this property continuously leaves old furniture and rubbish on the pavement, which they should take to the dump. It's dangerous to those with a visual impairment and blocks the pavement. We (the neighbors') have to lift it back onto the forecourt of number 37.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cambridge Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged man hole, 21st August
item.description:
Ongoing issue regarding man hole every time a vehicle goes over it it's chucking water and tarmac over pedestrians and over the parked cars whoever comes and temporary repairs it all they do is out a couple of bags of tarmac over the man hole 2 days later it's exactly the same again every other man hole at blackfen rd is level with the rd this one is sunken and has been like this for years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Blackfen Road, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge overflowing bins - public health hazard, 21st August
item.description:
These bins have been overflowing for close to a month with no collection, now people are leaving additional litter on the side of the bins because they are not getting picked up. Foxes and rodents are opening up the bags and it is disgusting.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alkham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Urinating in Datchworth Court stairwell, 21st August
item.description:
Someone is persistently urinating in the ground floor stair well that connects Theobolds and Datchworth Court. The whole stairwell reeks of urine. This started when the fob entry for the door was broken so anyone could access the stairwell

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Codicote Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
